attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the current imbalance  of Scots to English Members of parliament it must be deemed vital that  matters  that  only affect  the  English  population should  have no  input from  Scottish  members of parliament and should only be voted upon  by  MP's  in  English  constituencies

rejection.details: the title of your petition needs to be a call to action, not your name
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
